googledrive_file_added: ${user} added file ${googledrive_path} to Google Drive in ${node}
googledrive_file_removed: ${user} removed file ${googledrive_path} from Google Drive in ${node}
googledrive_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${googledrive_path} in Google Drive in ${node}
googledrive_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${googledrive_path} in Google Drive in ${node}
googledrive_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Google Drive addon for ${node}
googledrive_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Google Drive addon for ${node}
